Text.val: -- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
search for the first filename which we can use for the output file ...
no more valid output files. Operating has to clean output directory
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs

SQL_STMT_U.val: select debh_no,debh_hadr_name1,debh_hadr_name2,debh_hadr_address,debh_hadr_city,debh_hadr_zip,debh_hadr_country from (select invo_debh_no,sum(invo_aactualh) as wierzyt from :1/invo where days(':2') -days(invo_duedate)>90 and invo_invdate>='2005-01-01' and invo_markcodespec<>906 and invo_markcodespec<>941 and invo_markcodespec<>970 and invo_admno=1 and invo_clntno<>626 group by invo_debh_no ) as tb1,:1/debh where wierzyt>:3 and tb1.invo_debh_no=debh_no order by debh_no

select invo_debh_no,decimal(sum(invo_aactuali),13,2),invo_currency from :1/invo where days(curdate()) -days(invo_duedate)>90 and invo_aactuali<>0 and invo_debh_no=:2 group by invo_debh_no,invo_currency
